title: Cognitohazard
desc:
Post 5401
Abilities
- You may deal a Basic attack to one player each night.
- You many instead Rampage at a **Marked** player's house, dealing a Powerful attack to them and all visitors.
- You may also list **two terms** to be *banned* for the following day and night. These terms will replace the currently active terms if there are any.

Attributes
- The term **cognitohazard** and **cognito** is always considered *banned*.
- Other players who use *banned* terms in day chat or in their will become **Marked** when the day ends.
- Players who use *banned* terms in their faction chat become **Marked** the following day.
- Two days after two terms are added to the *banned* words list. Players will be alerted at the beginning of the day of the *banned* terms that were set two nights before.
- You are told who is **Marked** upon nightfall.
